Key databases – Searching for Articles and other Publications

  • BIOSIS Citation Index (1926- )
  • ProQuest SciTech Collection (1946- )
  • PubMed (1946- )
  • SciFinder (1907- )
    You must first create an account using your @umd.edu email address to use SciFinder.
  • Scopus (1960- )
  • Web of Science (Science Citation Index) (1945- )
  • Zoological Record (1864- )

Background Information – New to a topic, feeling behind or need a refresher?

  • Encyclopedia of Life Sciences
  • Encyclopedia of Life
  • Encyclopedia of Genetics, Genomics, Proteomics and Bioinformatics

 

Review articles - do not report new research, but instead summarize the current state of understanding on a particular topic. This makes them excellent choices for gathering background information that might not be represented in a broader encyclopedia or handbook.
  • Annual Reviews of...
  • Biological Reviews (1923- )
  • Microbiology and Molecular Biology Review (1937- )
  • Nature Reviews journals
  • Quarterly Review of Biology (1926- )
  • Wiley Interdisciplinary Reviews: Developmental Biology (2012- )

 

Searching for review articles from many journals at once:
  • ProQuest SciTech Collection
    After you search, choose "Review" under "Document Type" on the right.
  • Web of Science (Science Citation Index)
    After you search, choose "Review" under "Document Types" on the left.
  • Scopus
    After you search, choose "Review" under "Document Type" on the left.
  • SciFinder
    After you search, choose the "Refine" tab on the left. Then select "Document Type" and then "Review" to limit to review articles. Note, you must first create an account using your @umd.edu email address to use SciFinder.
